title: Fatback Bikes Are Now Corvus Cycles + 4 New Bikes including Crow Pass Ti Gravel / Adventure Dropbar
content:
If you weren’t paying attention, it would have been easy to miss Fatback Bikes at Sea Otter. They were there, just under their new name—Corvus Cycles. Why the change? After 14 years of reinventing the world of fat bikes, Greg Matyas and the rest of the team thought it was time to evolve with a

The post Fatback Bikes Are Now Corvus Cycles + 4 New Bikes including Crow Pass Ti Gravel / Adventure Dropbar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
